doc.field: Doxygen Style Guide Doxygen Style Guide The following is a list of the typographical conventions used in Doxygen document The first letter of the heading text is capitalized The number list is used to describe the operations and procedures for user The referred document is in Word form For referred documents in Doxygen use the reference link style below can be section id or subsection-id subsubsection-id or table caption or image caption The first No refers to chapter number and the second refers to caption index number The first letter of caption text is capitalized and ends with a period The first refers to chapter number and the second refers to caption index number The first letter of caption text is capitalized and ends with a period
